description: A Nasa research plane made an emergency landing in Texas on Tuesday. The aircraft's landing gear failed to deploy, forcing it to slide on its belly. Videos showed sparks and smoke as the plane came to a stop at Ellington Airport near Houston. Both crew members landed safely.

title: Inside the Chamba tragedy that left a pitbull guarding 2 bodies in snow for 4 days
description: A loyal pitbull named Jonu stood guard for four days over his deceased young owners, Viksit and Piyush, who tragically froze to death in Himachal's Chamba district. Rescuers found the brave dog refusing to leave their side. The cousins, aspiring vloggers, ventured into treacherous snow-laden mountains for content, leading to their fatal trek.

OpenAI VP Matt Knight resigns; shares 'note' sent to company on X
description: OpenAI's Chief Information Security Officer, Matt Knight, has resigned after over five years, having joined as the company's first security hire in 2020. Knight oversaw the development of OpenAI's security program, which now protects a global platform used by millions. He also led security product development, including the launch of Aardvark, before his departure.

title: Anthropic CEO hints from Davos that Zuckerberg was wrong to let Yann LeCun leave Meta
description: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei contrasted AI companies led by scientists with those run by social media entrepreneurs, implicitly criticizing Meta's direction following Yann LeCun's departure. LeCun reportedly clashed with Mark Zuckerberg over research priorities, leading to his exit and the hiring of a younger executive. This move highlights a perceived difference in approach to AI development and responsibility.

title: 'Reserve that table forever': Sunita Williams’ Falooda break in Kerala goes viral
description: Indian-origin astronaut Sunita Williams, recently retired from NASA, was spotted enjoying a falooda in Kozhikode, Kerala. The video of her casually savoring the local dessert with strangers has gone viral, highlighting her grounded nature despite her remarkable achievements in space exploration.

title: Travis Kelce supports Taylor Swift amid legal troubles as wedding plans pause
description: Travis Kelce has become a steady source of support for Taylor Swift as she navigates emotional strain linked to ongoing legal troubles around her inner circle. While staying publicly silent, Swift has leaned on Kelce’s guidance to protect her peace, set boundaries, and address personal tensions directly, even as wedding plans remain on pause.

title: Anna Kupp sparks debate wearing Seahawks coat against Rams in NFC showdown
description: Cooper Kupp’s NFC Championship appearance against his former Rams blended football and family into one powerful moment. Now with the Seahawks, the Super Bowl MVP faced his past while drawing strength from his wife Anna and their three sons. The matchup symbolized resilience, loyalty, and a fresh chapter driven by purpose.

title: Patrick Mahomes rehabs quietly as Brittany Mahomes ensures stability for their kids
description: Patrick Mahomes is enduring a demanding offseason as he recovers from an ACL and LCL tear, limiting his usual family routine. While he focuses on rehabilitation and a possible Week 1 return, Brittany Mahomes is creating joyful moments for their children, helping maintain normalcy as the Chiefs star patiently works through recovery.
